EmailTemplate.name: RE: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA (1339021043.
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA (1339021043.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Doug, I too show that you are enrolled. You can find the I-9 form in your enrollment documents (if you log in to your account you will see a link that says “enrollment douments”.) Once you have the I-9 you will sign/date section 1 and a local notary will sign/date section 2 ( there will be instructions on how to complete this form in your enrollment documents as well.) You can send this back to me via email (I don’t need a hard copy.) I will also need you to send me a copy of your US passport (you can just take a picture with your phone and email that to me.) Now all that being said, we sometimes have an issue with notaries in CA so I would like to find one for you so you do not have to go throuh the hassell. What is the closest city to you? Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: DouglasHerman [mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2012 4:51 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA Hi Sara, Okay it appears I’m now enrolled but I cannot get a copy of the I-9, so that I can print, sign and return. Doug From: DouglasHerman [mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com] <mailto:[mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com]> Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2012 1:37 PM To: 'Sara Conde' Subject: RE: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA I tried again to complete the process. Since I’m not subscribing to all the health…, and only filling out the I-9, I get a “System Error” message that says it has been sent to MBO Technical Support. I’m assuming I don’t fill in anything on the subsequent pages following the I-9, and simply proceed with the next button. Doug From: DouglasHerman [mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com] <mailto:[mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com]> Sent: Wednesday, June 06, 2012 10:14 AM To: 'Sara Conde' Subject: RE: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA Earlier this morning I attempted to complete this application and found that I have a few question, please give me a call at you convenience. Doug From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2012 10:21 AM To: Nic Merrin Cc: Cameron H. Matthews; douglas.herman@hotmail.com <mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com> Subject: RE: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA Hi Nic, Please find fully executed SOW attached. Doug just needs to complete the online MBO enrollment (he is working on this) and return a signed I-9 to MBO via email and he will be ready to start.Thank you!Sara From: Jessica Hartman Sent: Monday, June 04, 2012 12:47 PM To: Nic Merrin; Sara Conde Cc: Cameron H. Matthews; douglas.herman@hotmail.com <mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com> Subject: RE: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA Thanks Nic; I’ve copied Sara Conde here, and she will reach out to Mr. Herman today. Jess From: Nic Merrin [mailto:nmerrin@sentekglobal.com] <mailto:[mailto:nmerrin@sentekglobal.com]> Sent: Monday, June 04, 2012 12:27 PM To: Jessica Hartman Cc: Cameron H. Matthews; Nic Merrin; douglas.herman@hotmail.com <mailto:douglas.herman@hotmail.com> Subject: Re: Sentek Supply / Maintenance Systems Market Research Project NDA Good morning Jessica, Attached please find a work order for a new Sentek-MBO associate, Mr. Douglas Herman. I am cc'ing here Mr. Herman and his Sentek manager, Cameron Matthews. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks,Nic Nic MerrinSentek Global619.895.8030 <tel:619.895.8030>
